terraform.tfvars
files.content:
# Adjust as needed.
aws_region  = "us-east-1"
aws_profile = "user1001"

# Must be globally unique. Change if it already exists in another AWS account.
bucket_name = "s3-bucket-workshop-1001-pyday"

# Prefix used by the scripts
images_prefix = "imagenes/"

enable_versioning = true

# Legacy option: create an IAM user (not recommended). Prefer SSO/Identity Center.
create_iam_user = false
iam_user_name   = "user1001"

tags = {
  Project = "aws-boto3-workshop"
  Managed = "terraform"
}
